title: 1114 26 "For the Beloved Pupil - The Fist of Vice Admiral Garp!"Transliteration: "Manadeshi no Tame - Gāpu Chūjō no Genkotsu!" (Japanese:愛弟子のため ガープ中将の拳骨！) Hazuki Omoya Akiko Inoue Kazuya Hisada & Hone Hone August 4, 2024(2024-08-04) 2.7%[30]
transformers_text: 1114 26 For the Beloved Pupil The Fist of Vice Admiral Gar p Transliteration Man a de shi no Tame G pu Ch j no Genk o tsu Japanese Hazuki O moya Akiko Inoue Kazuya His ada Hone Hone August 4 2024 2024 08 04 2 7 30 Ko by finds himself cornered by a mob of pirates When they attempt to shoot him their guns fire flowers instead of bullets due to Hibari's use of Flower Bullets Gar p arrives and uses his Galaxy Impact attack causing massive destruction on Hachi no su Island As Ko by and Hibari prepare to rejoin Gar p Ku zan encases Hibari in ice and reveals his new allegiance to Blackbeard after resigning from the Marines
